com.hazelcast.jet.elastic.ElasticSourceBuilder

Packages that use ElasticSourceBuilder 
Package Description
com.hazelcast.jet.elastic
Contains sources and sinks for Elasticsearch 7

  • Uses of ElasticSourceBuilder in com.hazelcast.jet.elastic

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ElasticSourceBuilder<Void> ElasticSources.builder()
    Returns new instance of ElasticSourceBuilder
    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.clientFn​(SupplierEx<org.elasticsearch.client.RestClientBuilder> clientFn)
    Set the client supplier function
    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.enableCoLocatedReading()
    Enable co-located reading Jet cluster member must run exactly on the same nodes as Elastic cluster.
    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.enableSlicing()
    Enable slicing
    <T_NEW> ElasticSourceBuilder<T_NEW> ElasticSourceBuilder.mapToItemFn​(FunctionEx<? super org.elasticsearch.search.SearchHit,​T_NEW> mapToItemFn)

    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.optionsFn​(FunctionEx<? super org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest,​org.elasticsearch.client.RequestOptions> optionsFn)
    Set the function that provides RequestOptions
    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.retries​(int retries)
    Number of retries the connector will do in addition to Elastic client retries Elastic client tries to connect to a node only once for each request.
    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.scrollKeepAlive​(String scrollKeepAlive)
    Set the keepAlive for Elastic search scroll
    ElasticSourceBuilder<T> ElasticSourceBuilder.searchRequestFn​(SupplierEx<org.elasticsearch.action.search.SearchRequest> searchRequestFn)
